ch0133_90_shilver/0101_0701_01_10:
Finally, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You sure took your sweet time getting here.
ch0133_90_shilver/0101_0701_02_10:
If you keep spacing out, the day’ll be over before
you know it.
ch0133_90_shilver/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m not about to get cocky just because I’m a
Neo Champion now.
ch0133_90_shilver/7101_0701_02_10:
If I lost to someone because I let success go to my
head...well, that’d just be pathetic.
ch0133_90_shilver/7101_0701_03_10:
I’ll be aiming even higher than ever. Better hustle
if you wanna keep up.
ch0133_90_shilver/7102_0701_01_10: I raised my Tyranitar from an Egg.
ch0133_90_shilver/7102_0701_02_10:
Speaking of Pokémon Eggs, they always remind
me of that one professor in New Bark Town.
ch0133_90_shilver/7102_0701_03_10:
He forgave me for what I did...but it’s still hard
for me to look him in the eye.
ch0133_90_shilver/7103_0701_01_10:
They say Tyranitar’s destructive power is so
strong, it can make mountains crumble.
ch0133_90_shilver/7103_0701_02_10:
Don’t be scared of that when you face us in
battle, OK?
ch0133_90_shilver/7104_0701_01_10:
Every time I lost, I would get frustrated at myself
and my Pokémon.
ch0133_90_shilver/7104_0701_02_10:
But as we kept on battling, I could feel us getting
stronger, little by little.
ch0133_90_shilver/7104_0701_03_10:
Until we obtained a strength that we could call
our own.
ch0133_90_shilver/7104_0701_04_10: Guess it was all worth it, in the end.
ch0133_90_shilver/7105_0701_01_10:
What are your thoughts about me becoming a
Neo Champion, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0133_90_shilver/7105_0701_02_10:
Think I don’t fit the part? Or maybe you’re
jealous?
ch0133_90_shilver/7105_0701_03_10:
Hmph. I guess it doesn’t matter as long as you still
want to beat me.
ch0133_90_shilver/1701_0701_01_10: I have something for you. Here.
ch0133_90_shilver/1701_0702_01_10:
Hmph. If you don’t get stronger, I’m the one
who’s going to suffer.
ch0133_90_shilver/2501_0701_01_10:
Tyranitar is a Pokémon that wanders around
mountains searching for opponents.
ch0133_90_shilver/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve been doing something similar, going around
Pasio and looking for stronger opponents to battle.
ch0133_90_shilver/2501_0701_03_10: I won’t be satisfied by mediocre opponents.
ch0133_90_shilver/2501_0702_01_10:
You’d better stay sharp and be ready for us to
challenge you at any time.
ch0133_90_shilver/2501_0702_02_10: Consider that fair warning. Don’t disappoint me.
ch0133_90_shilver/2511_0701_01_10:
The closer I get to Lance’s level, the more I
understand what he meant about loving and
trusting Pokémon.
ch0133_90_shilver/2511_0701_02_10:
That’s why I can tell just how strong of a Trainer
he is.
ch0133_90_shilver/2511_0702_01_10:
I don’t hundred-percent accept everything Lance
says.
ch0133_90_shilver/2511_0702_02_10: I’ll find my own way to keep getting stronger...
ch0133_90_shilver/3001_0701_01_10:
The strong start training in the early morning.
Now’s the time to find your first opponent.
ch0133_90_shilver/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey, you! Let’s battle—I need a little exercise to
work off my lunch.
ch0133_90_shilver/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s about time to wrap up. I’ll have you train with
me again tomorrow.
